org.apereo.cas.web.support

Class CookieRetrievingCookieGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.web.util.CookieGenerator
      • org.apereo.cas.web.support.CookieRetrievingCookieGenerator
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TGCCookieRetrievingCookieGenerator, WarningCookieRetrievingCookieGenerator

    public class CookieRetrievingCookieGenerator
extends org.springframework.web.util.CookieGenerator
    Extends CookieGenerator to allow you to retrieve a value from a request. The cookie is automatically marked as httpOnly, if the servlet container has support for it. Also has support for remember-me.
    Since:
    3.1

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class org.springframework.web.util.CookieGenerator
